name: Silent Escape 2
description:
New information on "Silent Escape 2"
- Density events will be high
- The plot is be more extensive and will provide answers to some questions
- In some moments, be stealth
- One of the levels will be entirely composed of stealth
- The walkthrough mod time will be 1-2 hours (depending on the complexity and how you play)
- Mod may be will the cooperative
